value.title: Vibrating sleeve gives wearers a feel for languages
value.excerpt: For the past year or so, a student team from the Eindhoven University of Technology has been working on a wearable that could allow folks to understand what's being said in another language through vibrations on the arm.

value.title: Kozhikode-based AI-driven healthcare start-up gets funding from Malta govt

value.title: MediaTek chips had faced a vulnerability that allowed apps to eavesdrop on users
